verses.text: \w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G4521"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w week|strong="G4521"\w* \w began|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w dawn|strong="G2020"\w*, \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Magdala \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* gone \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w look|strong="G2334"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w grave|strong="G5028"\w*,

\w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G2400"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w* \w occurred|strong="G1096"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w angel|strong="G2597"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rolled|strong="G3037"\w* away \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seated|strong="G2521"\w* himself \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w appearance|strong="G2397"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* dazzling \w as|strong="G5613"\w* lightning, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w clothing|strong="G1742"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w snow|strong="G5510"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w terror|strong="G5401"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w guard|strong="G5083"\w* trembled violently \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* angel, \w addressing|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="G5210"\w* need \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*. \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w looking|strong="G2212"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G3708"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w*. \w Come|strong="G1205"\w*, \w and|strong="G3708"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* “\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G3708"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w going|strong="G4198"\w* \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*; \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.” \w Remember|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.’

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* left \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w awe|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w the|strong="G2532"\w* news \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Suddenly|strong="G2400"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \wj ‘Welcome!’\wj* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* women \w went|strong="G4334"\w* \w up|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* clasped \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w bowing|strong="G4352"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* ground \w before|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*,

\wj ‘\+w Do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*; \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3708"\+w* brothers \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* sisters \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w set|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w out|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Galilee|strong="G1056"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w see|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w*.’\wj*

\w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w still|strong="G2064"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* \w way|strong="G4198"\w*, \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w guard|strong="G2892"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* reported \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* chief priests everything \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w met|strong="G4863"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* holding \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w consultation|strong="G4824"\w*, \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w large|strong="G2425"\w* \w sum|strong="G2425"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* money \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2064"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2064"\w* \w stole|strong="G2813"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w while|strong="G2837"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w asleep|strong="G2837"\w*;

‘\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* matter \w come|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Governor|strong="G2232"\w*,’ \w they|strong="G2532"\w* added, ‘\w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w satisfy|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* see \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* nothing \w to|strong="G2532"\w* fear.’

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* soldiers \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* money, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w instructed|strong="G1321"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w story|strong="G3056"\w* \w spread|strong="G1310"\w* \w widely|strong="G1310"\w*; \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2983"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2453"\w* still tell \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w today|strong="G4594"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1519"\w* \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* told \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w meet|strong="G3588"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w bowed|strong="G4352"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* ground \w before|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*; \w although|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* felt \w doubtful|strong="G1365"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w up|strong="G1325"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w earth|strong="G1093"\+w* \+w has|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w been|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1325"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w Therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w make|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3100"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w nations|strong="G1484"\+w*, baptising \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w teaching|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* lay \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* heart \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* commands \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w given|strong="G1781"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w remember|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* close \+w of|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* age.’\wj*
